name: Escape from AI Facility
description:
In this game your mission is to escort your AI Companion to the end of the Space Station and escape. Your Ally is armed and can shoot enemys. You have no weapon but instead you have a shield that regenerates. Protect your ally by blocking bullets.

Controls:
Move with WASD or ARROW Keys
